title: Interactive Cognitive Games
summary: As an older adult, I want engaging cognitive games that are easy to play so that I can maintain my mental agility and have fun without feeling overwhelmed by complex technology.

title: Guided Physical Activity Programs
summary: As an older adult, I want guided physical activity programs tailored to my abilities so that I can stay active and maintain my independence without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Cognitive Activity Progress Tracking
summary: As an older adult, I want to track my progress in cognitive activities so that I can see my improvements and stay motivated to engage in mental exercises.

title: Customization of Activity Difficulty Levels
summary: As an older adult, I want to customize the difficulty levels of physical and cognitive activities so that I can engage in challenges that are appropriate for my abilities and help me stay active without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Exercise Reminders
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me to perform my physical exercises so that I can maintain my mobility and health independently.

title: Motivational Feedback for Activity Participation
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive motivational feedback on my physical activities so that I feel encouraged to participate and maintain my independence.

title: Engaging in Social Activities
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest group activities and events based on my interests, so that I can stay socially connected and feel included in my community.

title: Cognitive Health Assessment Tools
summary: As an older adult, I want to have access to simple cognitive health assessment tools through ALFRED so that I can monitor my cognitive function and engage in activities that support my mental agility.

title: Daily Activity Suggestions
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest daily activities based on my preferences so that I can stay engaged and maintain my physical and cognitive health.

title: Safety Monitoring During Physical Activities
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to monitor my safety during physical activities so that I can feel secure while exercising and receive timely assistance if needed.
